sentence.Network_en: Carrie realised the change of affectional atmosphere at once.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘉莉立刻感觉到气氛的变化.

sentence.Network_en: The bonds of marriage and family life are no longer functional, but affectional.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时,婚姻及家庭生活的纽带不再具有实用功能, 而具有了沟通情感的作用.

sentence.Network_en: In the end, sexuality includes physical intimacy and affectional intimacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 性既包括肉体上的亲密,也包含着情感上的亲密.

auth_sentence.content: The total frustration of his deepest affectional needs produced an emotionally starved individual.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The total frustration of his deepest affectional needs produced an emotionally starved individual.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的
